roleset.name: grow very rapidly, as mushrooms after rain
roleset.note: MUSHROOM-V NOTES: The temporal describes not the process of mushrooming, but the time atwhich the start state existed. (from mushroom.01-v)

example.name: missing EXT
example.text: From 1987 to 1988, the value of Chemical's option contracts outstanding mushroomed to $37 billion from $17 billion.
example.arg: the value of Chemical's option contracts outstanding

example.name: intransitive/ergative
example.text: The number of computers has mushroomed in recent years, with 10,000 in use, as well as 30,000 miniature models.
example.arg: with 10,000 in use, as well as 30,000 miniature models

example.name: inconvenient temporal
example.text: Junk bonds, which mushroomed from less than $ 2 billion at the start of this decade, have been declining for months as issuer after issuer sank beneath the weight of hefty interest payments.
example.arg: from [ less than $ 2 billion ] [ at the start of this decade]
